title: Rito please.
body: You guys dont want my money anymore? i just wanted to buy 1850 rp 6 hours ago and 7 hours ago it did worked and when i got the paysafe its disabled.So,logically rito doesnt want us to give them money

replies.body: I'm not sure what's causing this payment issue, but we'd like to help and see what's happening.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can check on this.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
I got the rp but thank you anyways for even reading my post
